Message:
Pulling my hood
low over my face,
I snuck into the village.
As I made my way
through the bustling crowds,
I pretended to stumble and trip.

With just a brief touch,
the man’s face turned pale,
and he collapsed to the ground.

Panicked murmurs quickly
spread through the crowd.

Sneaking out to drain
life force like this is dangerous,
but it’s the only way
we can survive.

As I repeated apologies
over and over in my heart,
I slipped away from the scene.

On my way back,
my thirst became unbearable.
When I reached the forest,
I spotted a small rabbit.

As I gently picked up the rabbit,
its life faded away
instantly in my arms.

“This is the only way
we can live...”

Tears rolled down my cheeks,
glowing crimson like blood.
